name: MegaJump Skater
description:
Sure you’ve run the temple, surfed the subway and crossed the road! But what’s more fun than FUN!? Perhaps even MEGA FUN?

MegaJump Skater introduces the player to the MEGA RAMP- The world’s largest skateboarding ramp ever conceived in the history of the known universe. Yes, that’s right, this is not just a ramp, it’s a MEGA RAMP!!!!

MEGAJUMP SKATER FEATURES:

- The world’s largest skateboarding RAMP! Please don’t google if it is…just accept that it is!
- Featuring thoroughly addictive gameplay that will keep you playing your way to MEGAJUMP SKATER Glory! A MEGA way to RAMP up your free fun time!
- Dice with disaster as your hurtle through the air at gravity defining heights! AKA MEGA JUMPS!!!!
- Navigate through FIRE, GLASS and other ridiculously dangerous obstacles!
- COMPLETE all the levels, upgrade your SPEED and earn SUPER COOL SKATEBOARDS to become the ultimate MEGAJUMP SKATER!

Challenge Accepted?
